landmarks.name: The Cracked Statue
landmarks.description: A cracked statue, whispering in an unknown, melodic tongue.

landmarks.name: The Sun-bleached Altar
landmarks.description: A sun-bleached altar, whispering in an unknown, melodic tongue.

landmarks.name: The Cracked Cave
landmarks.description: A cracked cave, humming a low, vibrating note.

landmarks.name: The Weather-worn Cave
landmarks.description: A weather-worn cave, pulsing with a faint, rhythmic light.

landmarks.name: The Glowing Pillar
landmarks.description: A glowing pillar, home to a silent, white-haired hermit.

landmarks.name: The Cracked Cairn
landmarks.description: A cracked cairn, swallowing all sound around it.

landmarks.name: The Shadowy Pillar
landmarks.description: A shadowy pillar, surrounded by a thin, unnerving mist.

landmarks.name: The Sun-bleached Altar
landmarks.description: A sun-bleached altar, swarming with spectral, blue butterflies.

ruins.name: Forgotten Bastion
ruins.description: An ancient forgotten bastion from the Age of Wonders.
ruins.history: Forgotten Bastion was once a center of magic before its fall.

storyThreads.title: Seals Breaking
storyThreads.summary: Ancient wards fail. What they imprisoned walks again.
potentialOutcomes: The evil is resealed, but weakened watchers remain.
The evil is destroyed at tremendous cost.
The evil proves to be misunderstoodnot evil at all.
The evil escapes and begins its conquest.
A bargain is struck with the awakened power.

storyThreads.title: The Old Darkness Returns

beats.summary: The ground becomes unstable. Engelwara remains seeks power and influence.

potentialOutcomes: The evil is resealed, but weakened watchers remain.
The evil is destroyed at tremendous cost.
The evil proves to be misunderstoodnot evil at all.
The evil escapes and begins its conquest.
A bargain is struck with the awakened power.

storyThreads.title: Echoes of the Past
storyThreads.summary: The dead do not rest peacefully in Greenmist.

beats.summary: The spirit of New Year fills Greenmist

potentialOutcomes: The spirits are laid to rest.
The haunting intensifies to lethal levels.
Coexistence is negotiated.
The ghosts reveal crucial information.
The "haunting" proves to have mortal origins.

storyThreads.title: The Bargain
storyThreads.summary: Wattie made a deal with powers best left alone.

beats.summary: The Hawk Compact declares a shortage of livestock

potentialOutcomes: The pact is fulfilled as agreed.
A loophole is found. The pact is broken.
The pact-maker pays the full price.
The terms are renegotiated at great cost.
The other party to the pact is destroyed.

storyThreads.title: Blood on the Trail
storyThreads.summary: Parthenius's Band stalks a dangerous quarry across the region.

beats.summary: Parthenius's Band spot signs of danger
The quarry turns the tables, becoming the Parthenius's Band. Parthenius's Band remains seeks justice and righteousness.
Tracks are found. The quarry draws near. Parthenius's Band remains seeks justice and righteousness.

potentialOutcomes: The quarry is slain.
The quarry escapes to parts unknown.
The hunters become the hunted.
An unexpected alliance forms.
The quarry is captured alivebut for what purpose?

storyThreads.title: Fire in Greenmist
storyThreads.summary: Parthenius's Band strikes fast at Greenmist and withdraws before retaliation.

beats.summary: orc raiders follow Parthenius's Band at a safe distance

potentialOutcomes: The raid succeeds with heavy plunder.
The raiders are intercepted and destroyed.
The raid escalates into open war.
The raiders demand tribute to stop.

storyThreads.title: What Was Promised
storyThreads.summary: In the region, ancient bargains come due.

beats.summary: The Hawk Compact declares a shortage of grain

potentialOutcomes: The pact is fulfilled as agreed.
A loophole is found. The pact is broken.
The pact-maker pays the full price.
The terms are renegotiated at great cost.
The other party to the pact is destroyed.
